author: prasad
msg: * moved maven-compiler-plugin to use jdk15 for source and target.
* moved tests in console and deployment suites to use TestNG annotations.
* introduced testng.xml for basic and test-deployments testsets.
* all tests now run and pass successfully.

author: mrglavas
msg: Update to the latest ASF license header. See http://www.apache.org/legal/src-headers.html.

author: mriou
msg: Making the VPU reentrant. Necessary for in-thread process to process interactions.
